author: Norman Zwane
message: Spoken well per this intepreter our languages are just beautiful. I'm enjoying the seTswana guy. "@Sinethemba Sakuba The language of office work is usually easy to deal with over time but for most people court language remains foreign. Unless you are exceptionally fluent "@Sinethemba Sakuba If you understand English @Aniceth De Missamou Home language is a right we all have to truly express ourselves. I may work in English but court is not work @Aniceth De Missamou The constitutional recognition of our home languages was to ensure that the principle of equality before the law is not slanted to favour the dominant. Just accept it. @Deon February I think we dealing with folks who have no idea how frustrating it is to be misunderstood. You get spoken to in a language that is secondary to your instinct to protect yourself. "@Ibo Thabo @I Am Free is a troll don't go down that line The big players in the ANC used these small guys and then let them hang out to dry. "@Molly Dhlamini @Yose Human @I Am Free are trolls @Tikvah Olam Its not a crime to ask for translation. It is equally not a crime to understand English as well. None is exclusive. I know a lot of people who can conduct a conversation better in both Most folk do not know what WHITE PRIVILEGE IS: White privilege is expecting that all people should converse only in your language and to then suspect use of another language as being evasive. @Sofia Sofia You did not. He said he prefers to respond in his home language - any problem there? He never said he does not understand English. He made a constitution allowed choice. "@clive oconnell Geez!! Are you an expert at stating the obvious or you just being thick? Where else in the world big as it is @Sofia Sofia If you are referring to the man on the stand then I think you are off your rocker to be making a judgement of corruption of this man. WHITE PRIVILEGE raises suspicion of Tswana speakers. @Thando Nkutha Well done Thando. I wish I did too. Shamefully I was one of those stupid ones who looked down Tsonga and Venda - for no reason except I was just too proud to learn. "@Thando Nkutha Right now ""nditota ku amba tshiVenda""I know I've bastardised the writing as well." @Thando Nkutha I was once at Turf and had a moVhenda girlfriend but stupid me never took advantage and learnt. Pathetic really. Not proud of that little bit of my past. "@Thando Nkutha You have quite a spread of South African routes @Thando Nkutha Wow! @Thando Nkutha In my lineage I find there was great frowning for marrying outside tribal lines hence my limited natural spread of relations in other tribal languages. @Phumla Setlhoke Now that is funny LOL "@Thando Nkutha At least you did not grow up in townships with Zulu section "@Thando Nkutha Yes "@Thando Nkutha I always have to stop myself when we argue with my kids "@Dominic Przybylski Makes sense "@Derek Main True dat. Some numb-bnuts think it devious "@Jean-Pierre Le Roux I'm arguing about language "@Dominic Przybylski Inheritence is a natural phenomenon so I'd be reluctant to go there at all.I think our problem precedes the inheritence @Dominic Przybylski You directing that questions about Zulus to me Dominic? @Dominic Przybylski I'd rather not as this does not follow from our earlier engagement. I'll give you space to speak to yourself. Soon you should be hearing yourself I think. @Luvuyo Zantsi I sure enjoy reading Ledwaba's decisions. I dont always agree with his reasoning but I just enjoy his legal logic. I find it fascinating- my apologies to those he finds against. @Thando Nkutha @Luvuyo Zantsi Is this not the kind of judgement Malema hoped Ngcukaitobi would get in order to take it to the CONCOURT? I know he ranted in Pressa but I thought that is what he said @Thando Nkutha He is still my fav judgement writer. One man's meat mta ka Nkutha kwasho amaNgisi @Nathaniel Perumal Hey Nathaniel is Trump going to be parading his weaponry as he threatened he might - just so we know what weaponry he has?? @Thando Nkutha I had my final teaspoons of love for Julius spilled yesterday. I thought the PRESSA was not necessary and I think he came across as a bully. So from now I'm in the other camp "@Thando Nkutha When you said Julius I was still talking about Justice Ledwaba "@Thando Nkutha In my limited history of the ANC @Thando Nkutha So much blood has been shed because peeps could not hear each other. @Thando Nkutha I go with that @Robert Russell I vote you to chair this commission. we would have a one line finding:ALL GOVERNMENT EMPLOYEES MUST SPEAK ENGLISH. @Robert Russell Talking of commission @Dominic Przybylski Why do you say that? @Dominic Przybylski That defines the prty or the leaders tendencies or there is no difference between the two for you? author: Dominic Przybylski
message: International language of communication should not be a 1st language of any country. It should be done in an international 2nd language like Esperanto. "What is zulu for ""ambassador"" and ""personal assistant""?" I have the privilege of perceiving myself as an individual rather than as a skin colour. I guess that's probably seen as white privilege. "@Yose Human I had hopes for CR but ain't seen nothing yet. How as ""Ramaphosa changed our lives""?" "@makhosi nobhatyi I hope you're right. My problem with CR is he was 2nd in command during the ""wasted 10 years"" but claims to have been ""shocked"" by everything which happened when we all knew." @makhosi nobhatyi He must have been reading some of the same newspapers that I was reading. "@makhosi nobhatyi I'm still hoping "@clive oconnell Nothing is for free. Once in power the liberation movements are obliged to indoctrinate people same as their leaders were indoctrinated by the providers of ""free weapons""." "@Michael Wild ""your highness"" should just about cover any situation." "@makhosi nobhatyi I hear you @makhosi nobhatyi NPA is [hopefully] being repaired but I don't see CR asserting himself in his own party. I suspect that is partly a problem of its philosophy which denies individual leadership. "@Norman Zwane I think it is just for practical reasons We need to understand that in 4th Industrial Revolution technology is the leading edge and most of it is specified in English. There isn't enough time to 'waste' it translating into other languages. The world is moving too fast for that. @Norman Zwane Yes apartheid gave whites privilege with regard to land ownership and that privilege has been inherited by current generation. Should any form of inheritence be allowed? Can inheritence be disallowed retrospectively? What are the limits? "If Zulus conquered other tribes and took their land "@Norman Zwane I'm kind of speaking to myself My father's family home was nationalised by communist government after 2nd World War. Now my own home is being threatened with the same by a new communist government. No. "@watson mutanga Same as people who 'hate' capitalism yet know nothing about it "EFF is the party of luxury - Moet Chandon @Norman Zwane I've been reading about what was found in their garbage at Camps Bay during SONA. @Norman Zwane It defines their lack of integrity.
